means: 似急流的，猛烈的，汹涌的

sentence.Network_en: There was frequent thunder and lightning, and torrential rain.
The game was cancelled owing to torrential rain.
The River Frome had burst its banks after torrential rain.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴雨过后弗罗姆河决堤了.

职称英语A级通关必备词汇-T6_新东方在线 ... transformer n. 变压器 torrential a. 奔流的，急流的，激烈的 tortoise n. 乌龟.

list.abs: torrential delta 洪流三角洲torrential fanglomerate 洪积扇砾岩torrential plain 山麓洪积平原
单词常用法笔记（１）_梁军_新浪博客 ... Burn the midnight oil 熬夜 Torrential flood 山洪 Hairbreadth 极小的距离.
2005年2月16日 -  Torrential表示“汹涌奔流的、湍急的、急流的”例如:torrential flood(山洪);torrential flow(湍流,激流);torrential rain(倾盆大雨);torrential applause.

...目录1基本定义量定级别划分标准2应对措施预防措施防御指南1基本定义量定级别暴雨黄色预警信号6小时内降雨量将达50毫米以上，或已达50毫米以上，可能或已经造成影响且降雨可能持续。[1]划分标准暴雨(torrential rain)是降水强度很大的雨。雨势倾盆。一般指每小时降雨量16毫米以上，或连续12小时降雨量30毫米以上，或连续24小时降雨量50毫米以上的降水。暴雨中国气象上规定，24小时降水量为50毫米或以上的雨称为(暴雨)。按其降水强度大小又分为三个等级，即24小时.
torrential fanglomerate 洪积扇砾岩torrential plain 山麓洪积平原torrential 急流的

entry.def: Torrential rain pours down very rapidly and in great quantities.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or resulting from the action of a torrent;

sentences.sentence: "torrential adaptations seen in some aquatic forms"

means.word_mean: 2. resembling a torrent in force and abundance;

sentences.sentence: "the torrential facility and fecundity characteristic of his style"- Winthrop Sargeant

means.word_mean: 似急流的, 猛烈的, 汹涌的; 倾泻的; 如注的

sentences.en: We got caught in a torrential downpour.
sentences.cn: 我们遇上一场瓢泼大雨。

sentences.en: The River Frome had burst its banks after torrential rain.
sentences.cn: 暴雨过后弗罗姆河决堤了。

sentences.en: The torrential rain had plastered her hair to her head.
sentences.cn: 暴雨使她的头发紧贴头顶。

sentences.en: The torrential rain may flood the low-lying land out.
sentences.cn: 这场骤雨有可能把低洼地淹没。

sentences.en: Rescuers battled against torrential rain and high winds.
sentences.cn: 救援人员奋力抵御疾风暴雨。

sentences.en: That summer a torrential rain poured down for two days and nights.
sentences.cn: 那年夏天,一场暴雨下了两天两夜。
